## Introduction

Philadelphia summers are hot. This project develops a shade-optimized 
pedestrian routing methodology to improve comfort while accessing transit...

## Research Questions

1. How do pedestrian comfort factors vary along routes to transit stops?
2. What are the distance/time trade-offs?
3. Which neighborhoods have poorest shade access?
